forgeFixMap.C1: Added comprehensive try‑except blocks in `src/web-server/main.py` and ensured subprocess errors are caught and translated to HTTP 500 responses.
forgeFixMap.C2: Implemented explicit validation of `project_type` against `VALID_PROJECT_TYPES` with a 400 JSON error response.
forgeFixMap.C3: Host and debug settings are now sourced from environment variables (`DEV_ENV_HOST`, `FLASK_DEBUG`) instead of hard‑coded values.
forgeFixMap.C4: Added `set -e` at the top of `src/automation/setup_scripts.sh` to abort on any command failure.
forgeFixMap.W1: Inserted detailed logging statements throughout request handling and script execution in `src/web-server/main.py`.
forgeFixMap.S1: Updated `templates/index.html` to include a Tailwind‑styled spinner that appears while the setup request is processing.
forgeFixMap.S2: Added explanatory comments and renamed variables in `src/automation/setup_scripts.sh` for clarity (`SELECTED_TYPE`, `LOG_DIRECTORY`, etc.).
